mapper.select: select * from knowledge where user_seq=#{userSeq} order by know_seq limit #{limit},9
select title from knowledge where know_seq=#{knowSeq}
select content from knowledge where know_seq=#{knowSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into knowledge(title, content, img, insert_date, update_date, category_seq, user_seq) values (#{title},#{content},#{img}, now(), now(),#{categorySeq},#{userSeq})
mapper.update: update knowledge set viewcount=viewcount+1 where know_seq=#{knowSeq}
